name: zettel-thinking-board
description: This is a Zettel Thinking Board for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.deploy-to-vault: npm run build && mkdir -p zettel-thinking-board && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css zettel-thinking-board && echo 'Copied to zettel-thinking-board/. Copy that folder to your vault .obsidian/plugins/zettel-thinking-board/'
